description: This nutty brittle is the perfect mix of sweet and salty.
name: Almond Pretzel Brittle Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the almonds in a large pan on medium heat for 3-4 minutes, tossing often to ensure they don't burn. Spread the almonds out on a large, parchment lined baking tray with the pretzels.

Melt the butter, caster sugar and golden syrup with 4 tablespoons of water in a large saucepan. Turn up the heat until the mixture bubbles up and cook for 10 minutes, until it turns a rich, golden brown colour, stirring from time to time.
Remove from the heat and pour the mix over the almonds and pretzels. Sprinkle with sea salt and set aside to set for 30-60 minutes before breaking into shards.
